name: New Technologies Prototype [Speech Input]
description:
New Technologies Prototype is an experimental project developed for a masters course project. It uses speech input on Windows to control a ball through an environment. 

Credits

  • Jonathan Ogilvie - Engine Management and Compiling
  • Thiago Souza - 3D Asset Development

Development System Specifications

MacOS

  • 14 Inch Macbook Pro (M1 Pro, 10C CPU + 16C GPU)
  • 32GB RAM

Recommended System Specifications

  • Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • 4 Core CPU or Better
  • 8GB RAM or Better
  • GTX 1650 or Better
  • 1GB Storage
